prompt:
🎯 Best Claude Code GUI Alternatives for Agent Delegation 
  Visualization

  Based on my research, here are the top options better than 
  Claudia for your use case:

  1. 🏆 Claude-Code-by-Agents (WINNER)

  # What we just cloned - this is the BEST option
  cd claude-code-by-agents

  Why it's superior:
  - Real Agent Delegation: Uses actual @agent-name mentions
  - Multi-agent orchestration: Automatic task decomposition
  - Visual workflow: See agents coordinate in real-time
  - Desktop app: Native GUI with web backend
  - Free: No API costs (uses developer's endpoint)
  - Hybrid agents: Mix local + remote agents
